quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
author: St. Jerome

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
author: Samuel Beckett

quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
author: Ken Venturi

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: It's always too early to quit.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: Never complain and never explain.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: You will never win if you never begin.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
author: William Blake

quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
author: Pauline Kael

quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
author: Unknown

quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
author: Philip Sidney

quote: If you want to conquer fear, don't sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
author: David Bailey

quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
author: Walter Scott

quote: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception, it is a prevailing attitude.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.
author: Alicia Witt

quote: We cannot change our past. We can not change the fact that people act in a certain way. We can not change the inevitable. The only thing we can do is play on the one string we have, and that is our attitude.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
author: Hans Selye

quote: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Attitude determines the altitude of life.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Some people say I have attitude - maybe I do... but I think you have to. You have to believe in yourself when no one else does - that makes you a winner right there.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Everything can be taken from a man but one thing: the last of human freedoms - to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, to choose one's own way.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The secret of genius is to carry the spirit of the child into old age, which means never losing your enthusiasm.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Time plays a role in almost every decision. And some decisions define your attitude about time.
author: John Cale

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes.
author: William James

quote: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel.
author: Lou Ferrigno

quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
author: Wade Boggs

quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: John N. Mitchell

quote: If your ego starts out, 'I am important, I am big, I am special,' you're in for some disappointments when you look around at what we've discovered about the universe. No, you're not big. No, you're not. You're small in time and in space. And you have this frail vessel called the human body that's limited on Earth.
author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quote: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners.
author: Loretta Young

quote: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.
author: Don Rickles

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Our environment, the world in which we live and work, is a mirror of our attitudes and expectations.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Attitude is everything.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Character is the result of two things: mental attitude and the way we spend our time.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Eagles come in all shapes and sizes, but you will recognize them chiefly by their attitudes.
author: E. F. Schumacher

quote: Attitudes are more important than facts.
author: George MacDonald

quote: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Our future cannot depend on the government alone. The ultimate solutions lie in the attitudes and the actions of the American people.
author: Joe Biden

quote: The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: I think it's my adventure, my trip, my journey, and I guess my attitude is, let the chips fall where they may.
author: Leonard Nimoy

quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.
author: Jane Addams

quote: Surfers have the most attitude.
author: Shaun White

quote: Bad attitudes will ruin your team.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: Between stimulus and response, there is a space where we choose our response.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.
author: William J. Brennan, Jr.

quote: The reactionary is always willing to take a progressive attitude on any issue that is dead.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: What is pride? A rocket that emulates the stars.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: You live in the image you have of the world. Every one of us lives in a different world, with different space and different time.
author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

quote: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.
author: Alan Watts

quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
author: John Ray

quote: Let us live for the beauty of our own reality.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: There is no definition of beauty, but when you can see someone's spirit coming through, something unexplainable, that's beautiful to me.
author: Liv Tyler

quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
author: Laetitia Casta

quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
author: Anne Roiphe

quote: The best part of beauty is that which no picture can express.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.
author: Ashley Smith

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
author: Maria Mitchell

quote: Never lose an opportunity of seeing anything beautiful, for beauty is God's handwriting.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness.
author: John Keats

quote: When virtue and modesty enlighten her charms, the lustre of a beautiful woman is brighter than the stars of heaven, and the influence of her power it is in vain to resist.
author: Akhenaton

quote: The beauty of a woman is not in a facial mode but the true beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul. It is the caring that she lovingly gives the passion that she shows. The beauty of a woman grows with the passing years.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: A women's greatest asset is her beauty.
author: Alex Comfort

quote: There is a kind of beauty in imperfection.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
author: Anatole France

quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures that we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
author: Anne Frank

quote: To love beauty is to see light.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: People are like stained - glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Beauty is in the heart of the beholder.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: Beauty awakens the soul to act.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Integrity reveals beauty.
author: Thomas Leonard

quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: In life, as in art, the beautiful moves in curves.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Beauty of whatever kind, in its supreme development, invariably excites the sensitive soul to tears.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
author: Ivana Trump

quote: In every man's heart there is a secret nerve that answers to the vibrations of beauty.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Inner beauty should be the most important part of improving one's self.
author: Priscilla Presley

quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Beauty is a fragile gift.
author: Ovid

quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
author: David Hume

quote: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.
author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: Zest is the secret of all beauty. There is no beauty that is attractive without zest.
author: Christian Dior

quote: Beauty is unbearable, drives us to despair, offering us for a minute the glimpse of an eternity that we should like to stretch out over the whole of time.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Beauty is worse than wine, it intoxicates both the holder and beholder.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Beauty is whatever gives joy.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: It is easy to be beautiful; it is difficult to appear so.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: Rare is the union of beauty and purity.
author: Juvenal

quote: Personal beauty is a greater recommendation than any letter of reference.
author: Aristotle

quote: Beauty is not caused. It is.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Beauty has a lot to do with character.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Beauty is a short-lived tyranny.
author: Socrates

quote: I heard the old, old, men say 'all that's beautiful drifts away, like the waters.'
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: It is not sufficient to see and to know the beauty of a work. We must feel and be affected by it.
author: Voltaire

quote: A witty woman is a treasure; a witty beauty is a power.
author: George Meredith

quote: Beauty is that which is simultaneously attractive and sublime.
author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quote: You can't really say what is beautiful about a place, but the image of the place will remain vividly with you.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: Beauty is only temporary, but your mind lasts you a lifetime.
author: Alicia Machado

quote: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it.
author: H. R. Giger

quote: Taking joy in living is a woman's best cosmetic.
author: Rosalind Russell

quote: What beauty is, I know not, though it adheres to many things.
author: Albrecht Durer

quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.
author: Eminem

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
author: William Morris

quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.
author: Sai Baba

quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
author: Sholom Aleichem

quote: Don't go through life, grow through life.
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Into each life some rain must fall.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
author: Bob Marley

quote: Life is too short for long-term grudges.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
author: Jackie Robinson

quote: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me'.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
author: William Wallace

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates

quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.
author: Will Smith

quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
author: Walter Hagen

quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?
author: George Eliot

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
author: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
author: Carl Jung

quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: We live in a rainbow of chaos.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.
author: John Wooden

quote: Make space in your life for the things that matter, for family and friends, love and generosity, fun and joy. Without this, you will burn out in mid-career and wonder where your life went.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
author: Philip Green

quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Life is never easy for those who dream.
author: Robert James Waller

quote: Unbeing dead isn't being alive.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
author: Grandma Moses

quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
author: Boris Pasternak

quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I restore myself when I'm alone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: The time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: The strongest man in the world is he who stands most alone.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
author: George Washington

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Solitude vivifies; isolation kills.
author: Joseph Roux

quote: To live alone is the fate of all great souls.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Loneliness is my least favorite thing about life. The thing that I'm most worried about is just being alone without anybody to care for or someone who will care for me.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: Let your mind alone, and see what happens.
author: Virgil Thomson

quote: You only grow when you are alone.
author: Paul Newman

quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self.
author: May Sarton

quote: Every man is born as many men and dies as a single one.
author: Martin Heidegger

quote: Solitude is independence.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone.
author: Keanu Reeves

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The longer one is alone, the easier it is to hear the song of the earth.
author: Robert Anton Wilson

quote: You come into the world alone and you go out of the world alone yet it seems to me you are more alone while living than even going and coming.
author: Emily Carr

quote: I never said, 'I want to be alone.' I only said, 'I want to be left alone.' There is all the difference.
author: Greta Garbo

quote: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
author: Laurence Sterne

quote: To be adult is to be alone.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: I would rather be a beggar and single than a queen and married.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Nothing makes us so lonely as our secrets.
author: Paul Tournier

quote: I have so many different personalities in me and I still feel lonely.
author: Tori Amos

quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone.
author: Lord Byron

quote: A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
author: Chanakya

quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
author: Conor Oberst

quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: Remember we're all in this alone.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: Only the lonely know the way I feel tonight.
author: Roy Orbison

quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I was never less alone than when by myself.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
author: Ellen Burstyn

quote: I'm fascinated with myself and love hearing the sound of my own voice. I'd like to hear what I have to say. A lot of people don't like being alone because they truly don't like themselves, but I love me.
author: Gene Simmons

quote: Who knows what true loneliness is - not the conventional word but the naked terror? To the lonely themselves it wears a mask. The most miserable outcast hugs some memory or some illusion.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: All of our unhappiness comes from our inability to be alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Still and all, why bother? Here's my answer. Many people need desperately to receive this message: I feel and think much as you do, care about many of the things you care about, although most people do not care about them. You are not alone.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone.
author: Albert Camus

quote: There's a tremendous difference between alone and lonely. You could be lonely in a group of people. I like being alone. I like eating by myself. I go home at night and just watch a movie or hang out with my dog. I have to exert myself and really say, oh God, I've got to see my friends 'cause I'm too content being by myself.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Your actions, and your action alone, determines your worth.
author: Evelyn Waugh

quote: The lonely become either thoughtful or empty.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: I may climb perhaps to no great heights, but I will climb alone.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: I've also seen that great men are often lonely. This is understandable, because they have built such high standards for themselves that they often feel alone. But that same loneliness is part of their ability to create.
author: Yousuf Karsh

quote: I finally faced the fact that it isn't a crime not having friends. Being alone means you have fewer problems.
author: Whitney Houston

quote: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Don't go away. I don't want to be alone. I can't stand being alone.
author: Arnold Rothstein

quote: I like my life alone. I mean, I love being with friends, and I love kissing and loving someone to pieces. But it's hard to find someone who doesn't ultimately start judging you and your choices.
author: Sarah Silverman

quote: If it's true that our species is alone in the universe, then I'd have to say the universe aimed rather low and settled for very little.
author: George Carlin

quote: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: Every day brings new choices.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Work hard for what you want because it won't come to you without a fight. You have to be strong and courageous and know that you can do anything you put your mind to. If somebody puts you down or criticizes you, just keep on believing in yourself and turn it into something positive.
author: Leah LaBelle

quote: I truly believe that everything that we do and everyone that we meet is put in our path for a purpose. There are no accidents; we're all teachers - if we're willing to pay attention to the lessons we learn, trust our positive instincts and not be afraid to take risks or wait for some miracle to come knocking at our door.
author: Marla Gibbs

quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Delete the negative; accentuate the positive!
author: Donna Karan

quote: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
author: Roger Clemens

quote: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
author: Betty White

quote: It's a wonderful thing to be optimistic. It keeps you healthy and it keeps you resilient.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: You are the sum total of everything you've ever seen, heard, eaten, smelled, been told, forgot - it's all there. Everything influences each of us, and because of that I try to make sure that my experiences are positive.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: No matter what you're going through, there's a light at the end of the tunnel and it may seem hard to get to it but you can do it and just keep working towards it and you'll find the positive side of things.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Always Do Your Best. Your best is going to change from moment to moment; it will be different when you are healthy as opposed to sick. Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: People deal too much with the negative, with what is wrong. Why not try and see positive things, to just touch those things and make them bloom?
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: To succeed, you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you.
author: Tony Dorsett

quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
author: Colin Powell

quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: You've done it before and you can do it now. See the positive possibilities. Redirect the substantial energy of your frustration and turn it into positive, effective, unstoppable determination.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
author: Christopher McCandless

quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything. I'm positive that a doer makes mistakes.
author: John Wooden

quote: Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It's the best part of the day.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: A good laugh is sunshine in the house.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
author: Pat Riley

quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
author: Allen Klein

quote: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that's all you're going to get back.
author: Kesha

quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
author: William James

quote: When you wake up every day, you have two choices. You can either be positive or negative; an optimist or a pessimist. I choose to be an optimist. It's all a matter of perspective.
author: Harvey Mackay

quote: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Positive feelings come from being honest about yourself and accepting your personality, and physical characteristics, warts and all; and, from belonging to a family that accepts you without question.
author: Willard Scott

quote: My dear friend, clear your mind of cant.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The person who can bring the spirit of laughter into a room is indeed blessed.
author: Bennett Cerf

quote: Today or any day that phone may ring and bring good news.
author: Ethel Waters

quote: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: My optimism wears heavy boots and is loud.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
author: Pitbull

quote: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people.
author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

quote: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: Say and do something positive that will help the situation; it doesn't take any brains to complain.
author: Robert A. Cook

quote: A lot of times people look at the negative side of what they feel they can't do. I always look on the positive side of what I can do.
author: Chuck Norris

quote: I surround myself with positive, productive people of good will and decency.
author: Ted Nugent

quote: But I have found that in the simple act of living with hope, and in the daily effort to have a positive impact in the world, the days I do have are made all the more meaningful and precious. And for that I am grateful.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: Every positive value has its price in negative terms... the genius of Einstein leads to Hiroshima.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Don't cry because it's over. Smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Smile, it's free therapy.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Colors are the smiles of nature.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Be thou the rainbow in the storms of life. The evening beam that smiles the clouds away, and tints tomorrow with prophetic ray.
author: Lord Byron

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: A gentle word, a kind look, a good-natured smile can work wonders and accomplish miracles.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Look back, and smile on perils past.
author: Walter Scott

quote: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
author: William R. Alger

quote: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.
author: Jeanne Calment

quote: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: If you smile when no one else is around, you really mean it.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: I'm really exciting. I smile a lot, I win a lot, and I'm really sexy.
author: Serena Williams

quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
author: Washington Irving

quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
author: Rashida Jones

quote: A smile is the universal welcome.
author: Max Eastman

quote: Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but scattered along life's pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: They might not need me; but they might. I'll let my head be just in sight; a smile as small as mine might be precisely their necessity.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: I think that anybody that smiles automatically looks better.
author: Diane Lane

quote: Remember even though the outside world might be raining, if you keep on smiling the sun will soon show its face and smile back at you.
author: Anna Lee

quote: I never smile unless I mean it.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: But God can only smile because only God can know what is coming next.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
author: Shinichi Suzuki

quote: Wear a smile and have friends; wear a scowl and have wrinkles.
author: George Eliot

quote: I want to touch the heart of the world and make it smile.
author: Charles de Lint

quote: The flower in the vase smiles, but no longer laughs.
author: Malcolm de Chazal

quote: A smile is the chosen vehicle of all ambiguities.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Better by far you should forget and smile that you should remember and be sad.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: It is impossible to persuade a man who does not disagree, but smiles.
author: Muriel Spark

quote: Nobody needs a smile so much as the one who has none to give. So get used to smiling heart-warming smiles, and you will spread sunshine in a sometimes dreary world.
author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Youth smiles without any reason. It is one of its chiefest charms.
author: Thomas Gray

quote: If the world's a veil of tears, Smile till rainbows span it.
author: Lucy Larcom

quote: When I look out at the people and they look at me and they're smiling, then I know that I'm loved. That is the time when I have no worries, no problems.
author: Etta James

quote: A smile abroad is often a scowl at home.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.
author: Goldie Hawn

quote: Laughter is day, and sobriety is night; a smile is the twilight that hovers gently between both, more bewitching than either.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: Never a lip is curved with pain that can't be kissed into smiles again.
author: Bret Harte

quote: I've always spent more time with a smile on my face than not, but the thing is, I don't write about it.
author: Robert Smith

quote: Smile, for everyone lacks self-confidence and more than any other one thing a smile reassures them.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: I have found that a smile and a stick will carry you through all right, and in ninety-nine cases out of a hundred it is the smile that does the trick.
author: Robert Powell

quote: The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: If you haven't seen your wife smile at a traffic cop, you haven't seen her smile her prettiest.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: As happy a man as any in the world, for the whole world seems to smile upon me!
author: Samuel Pepys

quote: Jesus wept; Voltaire smiled. From that divine tear and from that human smile is derived the grace of present civilization.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To smile at the jest which plants a thorn in another's breast is to become a principal in the mischief.
author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: And the smile that is worth the praises of earth is the smile that shines through tears.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: I was so embarrassed about mispronouncing words. I just knew how to smile.
author: Adriana Lima

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
author: John Ray

quote: A woman whose smile is open and whose expression is glad has a kind of beauty no matter what she wears.
author: Anne Roiphe

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Success is peace of mind which is a direct result of self-satisfaction in knowing you did your best to become the best you are capable of becoming.
author: John Wooden

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
author: Mark Twain

quote: There are people who make things happen, there are people who watch things happen, and there are people who wonder what happened. To be successful, you need to be a person who makes things happen.
author: Jim Lovell

quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Success is dependent on effort.
author: Sophocles

quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
author: David Frost

quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
author: Mike Ditka

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
author: Confucius

quote: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: To be prepared is half the victory.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: If at first you don't succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There's no point in being a damn fool about it.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
author: Euripides

quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game one foot from a winning touchdown.
author: Ross Perot

quote: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
author: Godfrey Winn

quote: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Success is sweet and sweeter if long delayed and gotten through many struggles and defeats.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: The greatest sign of success for a teacher... is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The real secret of success is enthusiasm.
author: Walter Chrysler

quote: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
author: Michael Dell

quote: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.
author: Aeschylus

quote: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: The one thing that I know is that you win with good people.
author: Don Shula

quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
author: Alexander the Great

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
author: Bear Bryant

quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: Martin Luther

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: What lies behind you and what lies in front of you, pales in comparison to what lies inside of you.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp, Or what's a heaven for?
author: Robert Browning

quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
author: Octavia E. Butler

quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.
author: John Wayne

quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
author: Wilma Rudolph

quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
author: Robin Williams

quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
author: Ben Okri

quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
author: Sharon Begley

quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
author: Democritus

quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
author: Aeschylus

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character - that is the goal of true education.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle

quote: The philosophy of the school room in one generation will be the philosophy of government in the next.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
author: John Dewey

quote: In the first place, God made idiots. That was for practice. Then he made school boards.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Education is the movement from darkness to light.
author: Allan Bloom

quote: What sculpture is to a block of marble, education is to the soul.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
author: Maimonides

quote: To educate a man in mind and not in morals is to educate a menace to society.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
author: Diogenes

quote: The great aim of education is not knowledge but action.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
author: Chanakya

quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Education's purpose is to replace an empty mind with an open one.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Change is the end result of all true learning.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: You are always a student, never a master. You have to keep moving forward.
author: Conrad Hall

quote: The illiterate of the future will not be the person who cannot read. It will be the person who does not know how to learn.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: Education is simply the soul of a society as it passes from one generation to another.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
author: Abigail Adams

quote: To read without reflecting is like eating without digesting.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Poor is the pupil who does not surpass his master.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Man is what he reads.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: The paradox of education is precisely this - that as one begins to become conscious one begins to examine the society in which he is being educated.
author: James Baldwin

quote: The whole purpose of education is to turn mirrors into windows.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, understanding is not wisdom.
author: Clifford Stoll

quote: The mere imparting of information is not education.
author: Carter G. Woodson

quote: Education is what survives when what has been learned has been forgotten.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: The only person who is educated is the one who has learned how to learn and change.
author: Carl Rogers

quote: My mother said I must always be intolerant of ignorance but understanding of illiteracy. That some people, unable to go to school, were more educated and more intelligent than college professors.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Don't limit a child to your own learning, for he was born in another time.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Education is all a matter of building bridges.
author: Ralph Ellison

quote: The goal of education is the advancement of knowledge and the dissemination of truth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Everybody is ignorant, only on different subjects.
author: Will Rogers

quote: If a man's wit be wandering, let him study the mathematics.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: If I were again beginning my studies, I would follow the advice of Plato and start with mathematics.
author: Galileo Galilei

quote: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: The object of education is to prepare the young to educate themselves throughout their lives.
author: Robert M. Hutchins

quote: It is better to know some of the questions than all of the answers.
author: James Thurber

quote: I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
author: Will Durant

quote: Learning is a result of listening, which in turn leads to even better listening and attentiveness to the other person. In other words, to learn from the child, we must have empathy, and empathy grows as we learn.
author: Alice Miller

quote: An education isn't how much you have committed to memory, or even how much you know. It's being able to differentiate between what you know and what you don't.
author: Anatole France

quote: No one has yet realized the wealth of sympathy, the kindness and generosity hidden in the soul of a child. The effort of every true education should be to unlock that treasure.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: It is a thousand times better to have common sense without education than to have education without common sense.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Responsibility educates.
author: Wendell Phillips

quote: All I want is an education, and I am afraid of no one.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Education is a better safeguard of liberty than a standing army.
author: Edward Everett

quote: He who laughs most, learns best.
author: John Cleese

quote: I tell students that the opportunities I had were a result of having a good educational background. Education is what allows you to stand out.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: Even when life challenges us, it's a gift beyond all measure.
author: Parker Palmer

quote: As a singer, you have to bring the soul to the song.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I believe in one power, and that is the hand of God. I respect all religions.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I've always loved life, irrespective of all the ups and downs that have filled my journey.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: One has to be fully committed to one's career. Otherwise, there's no point.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: From my experience and understanding, I believe money follows name and fame, while recognition calls for a huge amount of sacrifice. To get something, you have to lose something. That's the rule of life.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: My father passed away in 1942, and three-four months after his death, I had to start working. There was a responsibility on my shoulders to run the household. It was my duty as the eldest child in the house.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I feel God has sent me to Earth to sing. I started singing when I was five, but I don't think I've worked as hard as many other people.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I think playback singing has a lot to do with voice acting. I would suggest to all the youngsters to understand the character, situation, and the story behind the songs. That is when you can add soul to the rendition which, I think, is missing in today's music.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: For me, awards are a token of respect that people are giving me. So no matter how many awards I am receiving, I always feel emotional.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I missed out on my childhood. I had to work hard, but I was immediately given a place in playback.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: The privileged classes today are bothered about petrol and diesel prices while the poor can't afford two meals a day. I am a very small person, but I want us to think beyond personal and regional interests.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I wouldn't let a biopic be made on me. That's because I don't believe in them. I don't like them.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I have decided that I won't take up assignments that don't interest me.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I wish I had given more time to learning classical singing.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I have been singing for the last 50 years, you know, so I deserve a break. Besides, there are talented singers around who can do justice to their work.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: There are so many songs that I could not sing the way I wanted to. When such songs come on television or radio, I shut them off or leave the room.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: People, who accused me of practising a monopoly were wrong. The media fuelled rumours about my 'monopoly.' The first question I was always asked during interviews was about my supposed monopoly.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: Today, the scope for variety has shrunk drastically. There are only a handful of topnotch composers like A. R. Rahman, Anu Malik, Jatin-Lalit... that's it.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I feel I am a little unfit for the kind of music that is being made today. There is a big difference between what I sang earlier and what is being made now. I am not saying this music is bad, but there are too many beats.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I really liked Kishore Kumar. He had a virile man's voice, and he was truly versatile.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I have a fierce temper. I've mastered it over the years, but when I'm angry, no one can force me to do anything I don't want to.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: Nowadays, there are seven music directors in one film. I had never heard of such a thing before. If one of our old music directors was told to share a score with others, he would have left the assignment.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: I appreciate the change associated with people's growth, but I don't like the changes in our lives. I came to Mumbai in 1945, so imagine my acceptance of the massive changes around. I have witnessed every kind of revolution.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: When I started out, there was so much work that I couldn't think of doing anything else. I would go for recordings by 8.30 A.M., that, too, in trains. I used to come home at night. I was travelling alone everywhere.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: In my opinion, the biggest achievement was by Shankar-Jaikishan. With Raj Kapoor's 'Barsaat,' they changed the way we looked at playback singing.
author: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Teaching is a very noble profession that shapes the character, caliber, and future of an individual. If the people remember me as a good teacher, that will be the biggest honour for me.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Small aim is a crime; have great aim.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: If four things are followed - having a great aim, acquiring knowledge, hard work, and perseverance - then anything can be achieved.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Science is a beautiful gift to humanity; we should not distort it.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Never stop fighting until you arrive at your destined place - that is, the unique you. Have an aim in life, continuously acquire knowledge, work hard, and have perseverance to realise the great life.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Excellence is a continuous process and not an accident.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Where there is righteousness in the heart, there is beauty in the character. When there is beauty in the character, there is harmony in the home. When there is harmony in the home, there is order in the nation. When there is order in the nation, there is peace in the world.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: If we are not free, no one will respect us.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: My message, especially to young people is to have courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed.
