quote: A lot of people tell me a lot of things about my conduct, my game, my future... but I try to stay away from their words of wisdom. I don't let it distract me. On the field, you will be facing the ball alone. If you fail, you will the only one to blame. So, you should be the one deciding for yourself.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: I get really motivated when I put on the India jersey. It is a responsibility, so I want to perform in the best way I can.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: I've never fought with anyone. A lot of people talk to me, and they're like, 'Oh, you would have been fighting all the time when you were younger,' but I'm like, 'I never fought with anyone because I always knew that if I hurt myself, I might lose important time in my cricket career,' so I never got into any fight, ever in my life.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: Unless someone wants to look funny, I'll not recommend anyone to copy my bowling action. But on a serious note, with the confidence that I have got from the amount of runs I have been scoring, when I'm thrown the ball to bowl, I am pretty sure of what I have to do. I may not be the most attractive to watch while bowling, but I can be effective.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: My focus had always been the on-side. My coach wanted me to work on the offside strokes since he was convinced of my ability and timing on the leg side. I worked hard and firmed up my defensive technique. I am happy getting runs all around the wicket now, and getting a lot of boundaries. No one calls me a 'leggie batsman' anymore.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: If you do not tell the truth about yourself you cannot tell it about other people.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: My own brain is to me the most unaccountable of machinery - always buzzing, humming, soaring roaring diving, and then buried in mud. And why? What's this passion for?
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The eyes of others our prisons; their thoughts our cages.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Why are women... so much more interesting to men than men are to women?
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Life is not a series of gig lamps symmetrically arranged; life is a luminous halo, a semi-transparent envelope surrounding us from the beginning of consciousness to the end.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I thought how unpleasant it is to be locked out; and I thought how it is worse, perhaps, to be locked in.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Someone has to die in order that the rest of us should value life more.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I can only note that the past is beautiful because one never realises an emotion at the time. It expands later, and thus we don't have complete emotions about the present, only about the past.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: For most of history, Anonymous was a woman.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Mental fight means thinking against the current, not with it. It is our business to puncture gas bags and discover the seeds of truth.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Women have served all these centuries as looking glasses possessing the power of reflecting the figure of man at twice its natural size.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The beauty of the world, which is so soon to perish, has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Every secret of a writer's soul, every experience of his life, every quality of his mind is written large in his works.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Arrange whatever pieces come your way.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Language is wine upon the lips.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Nothing has really happened until it has been recorded.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: To enjoy freedom we have to control ourselves.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: As a woman I have no country. As a woman my country is the whole world.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I read the book of Job last night, I don't think God comes out well in it.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Rigid, the skeleton of habit alone upholds the human frame.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: It is far more difficult to murder a phantom than a reality.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: These are the soul's changes. I don't believe in ageing. I believe in forever altering one's aspect to the sun. Hence my optimism.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Once conform, once do what other people do because they do it, and a lethargy steals over all the finer nerves and faculties of the soul. She becomes all outer show and inward emptiness; dull, callous, and indifferent.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Fiction is like a spider's web, attached ever so slightly perhaps, but still attached to life at all four corners. Often the attachment is scarcely perceptible.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Humor is the first of the gifts to perish in a foreign tongue.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: One of the signs of passing youth is the birth of a sense of fellowship with other human beings as we take our place among them.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: It is fatal to be a man or woman pure and simple: one must be a woman manly, or a man womanly.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Really I don't like human nature unless all candied over with art.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: It is far harder to kill a phantom than a reality.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Boredom is the legitimate kingdom of the philanthropic.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Our favorite holding period is forever.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If past history was all there was to the game, the richest people would be librarians.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Look at market fluctuations as your friend rather than your enemy; profit from folly rather than participate in it.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I never attempt to make money on the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the market the next day and not reopen it for five years.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The first rule is not to lose. The second rule is not to forget the first rule.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Your premium brand had better be delivering something special, or it's not going to get the business.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Beware of geeks bearing formulas.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If a business does well, the stock eventually follows.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Let blockheads read what blockheads wrote.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Basically, when you get to my age, you'll really measure your success in life by how many of the people you want to have love you actually do love you.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Today people who hold cash equivalents feel comfortable. They shouldn't. They have opted for a terrible long-term asset, one that pays virtually nothing and is certain to depreciate in value.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We enjoy the process far more than the proceeds.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The business schools reward difficult complex behavior more than simple behavior, but simple behavior is more effective.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I sent one e-mail in my life. I sent it to Jeff Raikes at Microsoft, and it ended up in court in Minneapolis, so I am one for one.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The best thing I did was to choose the right heroes.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: It's never paid to bet against America. We come through things, but its not always a smooth ride.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: You do things when the opportunities come along. I've had periods in my life when I've had a bundle of ideas come along, and I've had long dry spells. If I get an idea next week, I'll do something. If not, I won't do a damn thing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: In the 20th century, the United States endured two world wars and other traumatic and expensive military conflicts; the Depression; a dozen or so recessions and financial panics; oil shocks; a flu epidemic; and the resignation of a disgraced president. Yet the Dow rose from 66 to 11,497.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: A public-opinion poll is no substitute for thought.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: You know, people talk about this being an uncertain time. You know, all time is uncertain. I mean, it was uncertain back in - in 2007, we just didn't know it was uncertain. It was - uncertain on September 10th, 2001. It was uncertain on October 18th, 1987, you just didn't know it.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Why not invest your assets in the companies you really like? As Mae West said, 'Too much of a good thing can be wonderful'.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We believe that according the name 'investors' to institutions that trade actively is like calling someone who repeatedly engages in one-night stands a 'romantic.'
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Economic medicine that was previously meted out by the cupful has recently been dispensed by the barrel. These once unthinkable dosages will almost certainly bring on unwelcome after-effects. Their precise nature is anyone's guess, though one likely consequence is an onslaught of inflation.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Risk is a part of God's game, alike for men and nations.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If anything, taxes for the lower and middle class and maybe even the upper middle class should even probably be cut further. But I think that people at the high end - people like myself - should be paying a lot more in taxes. We have it better than we've ever had it.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The only time to buy these is on a day with no 'y' in it.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Value is what you get.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We've used up a lot of bullets. And we talk about stimulus. But the truth is, we're running a federal deficit that's 9 percent of GDP. That is stimulative as all get out. It's more stimulative than any policy we've followed since World War II.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: We always live in an uncertain world. What is certain is that the United States will go forward over time.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I bought a company in the mid-'90s called Dexter Shoe and paid $400 million for it. And it went to zero. And I gave about $400 million worth of Berkshire stock, which is probably now worth $400 billion. But I've made lots of dumb decisions. That's part of the game.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: The smarter the journalists are, the better off society is. For to a degree, people read the press to inform themselves - and the better the teacher, the better the student body.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I think the most important factor in getting out of the recession actually is just the regenerative capacity of - of American capitalism.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I am a huge bull on this country. We will not have a double-dip recession at all. I see our businesses coming back almost across the board.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Give yourself a gift of five minutes of contemplation in awe of everything you see around you. Go outside and turn your attention to the many miracles around you. This five-minute-a-day regimen of appreciation and gratitude will help you to focus your life in awe.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You cannot always control what goes on outside. But you can always control what goes on inside.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Our intention creates our reality.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Conflict cannot survive without your participation.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You can either be a host to God, or a hostage to your ego. It's your call.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Love is the ability and willingness to allow those that you care for to be what they choose for themselves without any insistence that they satisfy you.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Loving people live in a loving world. Hostile people live in a hostile world. Same world.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The highest form of ignorance is when you reject something you don't know anything about.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Our lives are a sum total of the choices we have made.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Everything that's created comes out of silence. Your thoughts emerge from the nothingness of silence. Your words come out of this void. Your very essence emerged from emptiness. All creativity requires some stillness.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: To be more childlike, you don't have to give up being an adult. The fully integrated person is capable of being both an adult and a child simultaneously. Recapture the childlike feelings of wide-eyed excitement, spontaneous appreciation, cutting loose, and being full of awe and wonder at this magnificent universe.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Stop acting as if life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and gone. The future is not guaranteed.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The truth is that there is no actual stress or anxiety in the world; it's your thoughts that create these false beliefs. You can't package stress, touch it, or see it. There are only people engaged in stressful thinking.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: It's never crowded along the extra mile.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: There is no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love; there's only scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Everything you need you already have. You are complete right now, you are a whole, total person, not an apprentice person on the way to someplace else. Your completeness must be understood by you and experienced in your thoughts as your own personal reality.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Your life is like a play with several acts. Some of the characters who enter have short roles to play, others, much larger. Some are villains and others are good guys. But all of them are necessary; otherwise, they wouldn't be in the play. Embrace them all, and move on to the next act.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: It makes no sense to worry about things you have no control over because there's nothing you can do about them, and why worry about things you do control? The activity of worrying keeps you immobilized.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Transformation literally means going beyond your form.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You aren't your work, your accomplishments, your possessions, your home, your family... your anything. You're a creation of your Source, dressed in a physical human body intended to experience and enjoy life on Earth.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The ego is only an illusion, but a very influential one. Letting the ego-illusion become your identity can prevent you from knowing your true self. Ego, the false idea of believing that you are what you have or what you do, is a backwards way of assessing and living life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You can never get enough of what you don't want.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Abundance is not something we acquire. It is something we tune into.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Having a mind that is open to everything and attached to nothing seems to me to be one of the most basic principles that you can adopt to contribute to individual and world peace.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: You'll see it when you believe it.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The essential lesson I've learned in life is to just be yourself. Treasure the magnificent being that you are and recognize first and foremost you're not here as a human being only. You're a spiritual being having a human experience.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: There is no greater power in Heaven or on Earth than pure, unconditional love. The nature of the God force, the unseen intelligence in all things, which causes the material world and is the center of both the spiritual and physical plane, is best described as pure, unconditional love.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Relationships based on obligation lack dignity.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Live one day at a time emphasizing ethics rather than rules.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Begin to see yourself as a soul with a body rather than a body with a soul.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When you are spiritually connected, you are not looking for occasions to be offended, and you are not judging and labeling others. You are in a state of grace in which you know you are connected to God and thus free from the effects of anyone or anything external to yourself.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: It is impossible for you to be angry and laugh at the same time. Anger and laughter are mutually exclusive and you have the power to choose either.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Judgements prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Everything you are against weakens you. Everything you are for empowers you.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Faith is the complete reliance on the power and goodness of Spirit and the firm belief that you are always connected to this goodness. Always affirm your faith and not your doubt.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Within all of us is a divine capacity to manifest and attract all that we need and desire.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: When you're just like everybody else, you've nothing to offer other than your conformity.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Self-actualized people are independent of the good opinion of others.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Thoughts are mental energy; they're the currency that you have to attract what you desire. Learn to stop spending that currency on thoughts you don't want.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Maxim for life: You get treated in life the way you teach people to treat you.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: One of the most important decisions you'll ever make is choosing the kind of universe you exist in: is it helpful and supportive or hostile and unsupportive? Your answer to this question will make all the difference in terms of how you live your life and what kind of Divine assistance you attract.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Needing to have things perfect is the surest way to immobilize yourself with frustration.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: There's nothing wrong with anger provided you use it constructively.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Fear is present when we forget that we are a part of God's divine design. Learning to experience authentic love means abandoning ego's insistence that you have much to fear and that you are in an unfriendly world. You can make the decision to be free from fear and doubt and return to the brilliant light of love that is always with you.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I spent years studying the teachings of Patanjali, and he reminded us several thousand years ago that when we are steadfast - which means that we never slip in our abstention of thoughts of harm directed toward others - then all living creatures cease to feel enmity in our presence.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Heaven is a state of mind, not a location, since Spirit is everywhere and in everything.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
author: William Blake

quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
author: William Blake

quote: He who binds to himself a joy Does the winged life destroy; But he who kisses the joy as it flies Lives in eternity's sun rise.
author: William Blake

quote: If the Sun and Moon should ever doubt, they'd immediately go out.
author: William Blake

quote: To see a world in a grain of sand and heaven in a wild flower Hold infinity in the palm of your hand and eternity in an hour.
author: William Blake

quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
author: William Blake

quote: The fool who persists in his folly will become wise.
author: William Blake

quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: A truth that's told with bad intent beats all the lies you can invent.
author: William Blake

quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
author: William Blake

quote: Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
author: William Blake

quote: He who desires, but acts not, breeds pestilence.
author: William Blake

quote: Art can never exist without naked beauty displayed.
author: William Blake

quote: He who would do good to another must do it in Minute Particulars: general Good is the plea of the scoundrel, hypocrite, and flatterer, for Art and Science cannot exist but in minutely organized Particulars.
author: William Blake

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
author: William Blake

quote: When the green woods laugh with the voice of joy, And the dimpling stream runs laughing by; When the air does laugh with our merry wit, And the green hill laughs with the noise of it.
author: William Blake

quote: If the fool would persist in his folly he would become wise.
author: William Blake

quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
author: William Blake

quote: The hours of folly are measured by the clock; but of wisdom, no clock can measure.
author: William Blake

quote: I must create a system or be enslaved by another mans; I will not reason and compare: my business is to create.
author: William Blake

quote: The true method of knowledge is experiment.
author: William Blake

quote: You never know what is enough unless you know what is more than enough.
author: William Blake

quote: Energy is an eternal delight, and he who desires, but acts not, breeds pestilence.
author: William Blake

quote: When I tell the truth, it is not for the sake of convincing those who do not know it, but for the sake of defending those that do.
author: William Blake

quote: Imagination is the real and eternal world of which this vegetable universe is but a faint shadow.
author: William Blake

quote: The tree which moves some to tears of joy is in the eyes of others only a green thing that stands in the way. Some see nature all ridicule and deformity... and some scarce see nature at all. But to the eyes of the man of imagination, nature is imagination itself.
author: William Blake

quote: A fool sees not the same tree that a wise man sees.
author: William Blake

quote: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest.
author: William Blake

quote: For everything that lives is holy, life delights in life.
author: William Blake

quote: In seed time learn, in harvest teach, in winter enjoy.
author: William Blake

quote: Exuberance is beauty.
author: William Blake

quote: Both read the Bible day and night, but thou read black where I read white.
author: William Blake

quote: Love to faults is always blind, always is to joy inclined. Lawless, winged, and unconfined, and breaks all chains from every mind.
author: William Blake

quote: What is now proved was once only imagined.
author: William Blake

quote: Without contraries is no progression. Attraction and repulsion, reason and energy, love and hate, are necessary to human existence.
author: William Blake

quote: The man who never alters his opinions is like standing water, and breeds reptiles of the mind.
author: William Blake

quote: Prudence is a rich, ugly, old maid courted by incapacity.
author: William Blake

quote: The tigers of wrath are wiser than the horses of instruction.
author: William Blake

quote: Can I see another's woe, and not be in sorrow too? Can I see another's grief, and not seek for kind relief?
author: William Blake

quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.
author: William Blake

quote: Love seeketh not itself to please, nor for itself hath any care, but for another gives its ease, and builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.
author: William Blake

quote: Prisons are built with stones of Law. Brothels with the bricks of religion.
author: William Blake

quote: Excessive sorrow laughs. Excessive joy weeps.
author: William Blake

quote: To generalize is to be an idiot.
author: William Blake

quote: One thought fills immensity.
author: William Blake

quote: I have no name: I am but two days old. What shall I call thee? I happy am, Joy is my name. Sweet joy befall thee!
author: William Blake

quote: Poetry fettered, fetters the human race. Nations are destroyed or flourish in proportion as their poetry, painting, and music are destroyed or flourish.
author: William Blake

quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning.
author: William Blake

quote: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom.
author: William Blake

quote: Where mercy, love, and pity dwell, there God is dwelling too.
author: William Blake

quote: Want of money and the distress of a thief can never be alleged as the cause of his thieving, for many honest people endure greater hardships with fortitude. We must therefore seek the cause elsewhere than in want of money, for that is the miser's passion, not the thief s.
author: William Blake

quote: When a sinister person means to be your enemy, they always start by trying to become your friend.
author: William Blake

quote: The eye altering, alters all.
author: William Blake

quote: Opposition is true friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: Do what you will, this world's a fiction and is made up of contradiction.
author: William Blake

quote: Every harlot was a virgin once.
author: William Blake

quote: Always be ready to speak your mind, and a base man will avoid you.
author: William Blake

quote: What is the price of experience? Do men buy it for a song? Or wisdom for a dance in the street? No, it is bought with the price of all the man hath, his house, his wife, his children.
author: William Blake

quote: He whose face gives no light, shall never become a star.
author: William Blake

quote: The soul of sweet delight, can never be defiled.
author: William Blake

quote: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: A good laugh is sunshine in the house.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Next to excellence is the appreciation of it.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Do not be in a hurry to succeed. What would you have to live for afterwards? Better make the horizon your goal; it will always be ahead of you.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: It is best to love wisely, no doubt; but to love foolishly is better than not to be able to love at all.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Follow your honest convictions and be strong.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: When I walk with you I feel as if I had a flower in my buttonhole.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: It is only hope which is real, and reality is a bitterness and a deceit.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I never knew whether to pity or congratulate a man on coming to his senses.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: There are a thousand thoughts lying within a man that he does not know till he takes up a pen to write.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: 'Tis strange what a man may do, and a woman yet think him an angel.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Dinner was made for eating, not for talking.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I would rather make my name than inherit it.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: A clever, ugly man every now and then is successful with the ladies, but a handsome fool is irresistible.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The world is a looking glass and gives back to every man the reflection of his own face.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: People hate as they love, unreasonably.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Bravery never goes out of fashion.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The two most engaging powers of an author are to make new things familiar, familiar things new.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Let a man who has to make his fortune in life remember this maxim: Attacking is the only secret. Dare and the world yields, or if it beats you sometimes, dare it again and you will succeed.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Kindnesses are easily forgotten; but injuries! what worthy man does not keep those in mind?
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: If a secret history of books could be written, and the author's private thoughts and meanings noted down alongside of his story, how many insipid volumes would become interesting, and dull tales excite the reader!
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: An evil person is like a dirty window, they never let the light shine through.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: People who do not know how to laugh are always pompous and self-conceited.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Remember, it's as easy to marry a rich woman as a poor woman.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The book of female logic is blotted all over with tears, and Justice in their courts is forever in a passion.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: It is to the middle-class we must look for the safety of England.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Except for the young or very happy, I can't say I am sorry for anyone who dies.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: There are many sham diamonds in this life which pass for real, and vice versa.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: What money is better bestowed than that of a schoolboy's tip? How the kindness is recalled by the recipient in after days! It blesses him that gives and him that takes.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Despair is perfectly compatible with a good dinner, I promise you.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Next to the young, I suppose the very old are the most selfish.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: It is impossible, in our condition of Society, not to be sometimes a Snob.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: There is nothing either good or bad but thinking makes it so.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players: they have their exits and their entrances; and one man in his time plays many parts, his acts being seven ages.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: There is a tide in the affairs of men, Which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune. Omitted, all the voyage of their life is bound in shallows and in miseries. On such a full sea are we now afloat. And we must take the current when it serves, or lose our ventures.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: No legacy is so rich as honesty.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you prick us do we not bleed? If you tickle us do we not laugh? If you poison us do we not die? And if you wrong us shall we not revenge?
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Some rise by sin, and some by virtue fall.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Good night, good night! Parting is such sweet sorrow, that I shall say good night till it be morrow.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: What's in a name? That which we call a rose by any other name would smell as sweet.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: This life, which had been the tomb of his virtue and of his honour, is but a walking shadow; a poor player, that struts and frets his hour upon the stage, and then is heard no more: it is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Though she be but little, she is fierce.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Ignorance is the curse of God; knowledge is the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Suspicion always haunts the guilty mind.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: To thine own self be true, and it must follow, as the night the day, thou canst not then be false to any man.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire, Doubt that the sun doth move. Doubt truth to be a liar, But never doubt I love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: My pride fell with my fortunes.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: When sorrows come, they come not single spies, but in battalions.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The undiscovered country from whose bourn no traveler returns.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Listen to many, speak to a few.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: To do a great right do a little wrong.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Heat not a furnace for your foe so hot that it do singe yourself.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: In time we hate that which we often fear.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you can look into the seeds of time, and say which grain will grow and which will not, speak then unto me.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Boldness be my friend.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The robbed that smiles, steals something from the thief.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Our doubts are traitors and make us lose the good we oft might win by fearing to attempt.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
author: William Shakespeare

quote: There's no art to find the mind's construction in the face.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: How far that little candle throws its beams! So shines a good deed in a naughty world.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: 'Tis not enough to help the feeble up, but to support them after.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks, shall win my love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: What's done can't be undone.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Men are April when they woo, December when they wed. Maids are May when they are maids, but the sky changes when they are wives.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Such as we are made of, such we be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Life is as tedious as twice-told tale, vexing the dull ear of a drowsy man.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Give every man thy ear, but few thy voice.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: And this, our life, exempt from public haunt, finds tongues in trees, books in the running brooks, sermons in stones, and good in everything.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I hold the world but as the world, Gratiano; A stage where every man must play a part, And mine is a sad one.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love sought is good, but given unsought, is better.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: As flies to wanton boys, are we to the gods; they kill us for their sport.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Sweet mercy is nobility's true badge.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The man that hath no music in himself, Nor is not moved with concord of sweet sounds, is fit for treasons, stratagems and spoils.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Speak low, if you speak love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: My crown is called content, a crown that seldom kings enjoy.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Wisdom is oftentimes nearer when we stoop than when we soar.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: That though the radiance which was once so bright be now forever taken from my sight. Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, glory in the flower. We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Nature never did betray the heart that loved her.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The best portion of a good man's life is his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and of love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The ocean is a mighty harmonist.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: To begin, begin.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Poetry is the spontaneous overflow of powerful feelings: it takes its origin from emotion recollected in tranquility.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: That best portion of a man's life, his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: To me the meanest flower that blows can give thoughts that do often lie too deep for tears.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Life is divided into three terms - that which was, which is, and which will be. Let us learn from the past to profit by the present, and from the present, to live better in the future.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: What we need is not the will to believe, but the wish to find out.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The things which I have seen I now can see no more.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Come forth into the light of things, let nature be your teacher.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Faith is a passionate intuition.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: When from our better selves we have too long been parted by the hurrying world, and droop. Sick of its business, of its pleasures tired, how gracious, how benign is solitude.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: One impulse from a vernal wood May teach you more of man, Of moral evil and of good, Than all the sages can.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The child is father of the man.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Our birth is but a sleep and a forgetting. Not in entire forgetfulness, and not in utter nakedness, but trailing clouds of glory do we come.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: How does the Meadow flower its bloom unfold? Because the lovely little flower is free down to its root, and in that freedom bold.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: For I have learned to look on nature, not as in the hour of thoughtless youth, but hearing oftentimes the still, sad music of humanity.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: What is pride? A rocket that emulates the stars.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Getting and spending, we lay waste our powers.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Fill your paper with the breathings of your heart.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Not without hope we suffer and we mourn.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The mind that is wise mourns less for what age takes away; than what it leaves behind.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The world is too much with us; late and soon, getting and spending, we lay waste our powers: Little we see in Nature that is ours.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Pictures deface walls more often than they decorate them.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Suffering is permanent, obscure and dark, And shares the nature of infinity.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: I listened, motionless and still; And, as I mounted up the hill, The music in my heart I bore, Long after it was heard no more.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: A multitude of causes unknown to former times are now acting with a combined force to blunt the discriminating powers of the mind, and unfitting it for all voluntary exertion to reduce it to a state of almost savage torpor.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: But an old age serene and bright, and lovely as a Lapland night, shall lead thee to thy grave.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Golf is a day spent in a round of strenuous idleness.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: The human mind is capable of excitement without the application of gross and violent stimulants; and he must have a very faint perception of its beauty and dignity who does not know this.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Rapine, avarice, expense, This is idolatry; and these we adore; Plain living and high thinking are no more.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: I am a Hindu, and I have pride in that.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: People had lost trust in governance. Getting back that trust, instilling a sense of hope and belief that good governance and development would be back on track, is my biggest achievement.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: A victory for the BJP means a victory for prosperity and development.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: If you want to see law and order, then come to Uttar Pradesh.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The real Hindu vision is that nobody will be discriminated against or favoured. Everyone is equal.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I don't have a personal life. Whatever I have is for the country and society.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Secularism is intact because of Hindus.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The country will never vote in favour of those who do not acknowledge Lord Ram and Lord Krishna.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: There's no need to be fearful of me. I am involved in the welfare of people and giving them good governance.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I am not a full-time politician but a 'sanyasi' who took the path of politics to serve the masses.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Religion is a comprehensive concept. According to our learned people, our scholars, to pave the path for public welfare in worldly life and to provide spiritual uplift is part of religion. I think a yogi can do both things quite easily. And I manage to balance both worldly and spiritual concerns.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I have said it previously and saying it again... my government will work for betterment of all, irrespective of caste or religion.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Rahul Gandhi does not know Indian culture, so when he went to offer prayers at Kashi Vishwanath temple, he sat in a position as if he was offering namaaz.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: A Hindu is interested in the welfare of all: not merely humans, but all living beings.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: 'Hindu terrorism' is not even a word. By linking Hindu with terrorism, Congress has disrespected the country's culture, tradition, and legacy. It should apologise to the nation.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The BJP has never considered its political opponents as enemies.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I rely on people who can deliver.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Manmohan Singh, during his tenure as Prime Minister, said that Muslims have first right over the resources of this country. Where will the Dalits, backward, women, tribal, and others go?
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I think there are lot of people who do politics in the name of Dr. Lohia, but his dream has been fulfilled by PM Modi.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Winning and losing have their significance in a democracy. But there should be no arrogance in victory, nor should there be any despondency in defeat.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The bureaucracy always goes with the way politicians go.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I cannot recite Hanuman chalisa at home and wear a skull cap outside just to attract votes. It is my responsibility that, without losing my identity, I must ensure a peaceful environment for people of all faiths so that they can follow their beliefs.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The Taj Mahal can be a tourist attraction, an architectural marvel, but it can never be treated as a monument of faith. After all, there is a difference between tourism and faith.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Law and order is a state responsibility. I can assure you peace will be maintained in Uttar Pradesh.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: People should beware of those who hail terrorists and play with the security of the country.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The name of a district or a commissionerate should be what the country and the world identifies it with.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Vegetarian food is actually good for the body.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Once, Azamgarh was known in the field of education and literature, but the Samajwadi Party turned it into a stronghold of terrorism.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Some people in India want to increase corruption and dishonesty in the name of caste.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Officers are not fruit. I can't pick them off a tree.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I am committed to the safety and development of every community and region in the state.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Nobody is allowed to break the law.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: In my very first Cabinet meeting, I told my colleagues we must take on corruption, lawlessness, casteism, and the politics of appeasement.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I think there is no difference between the language of Shah Rukh Khan and Hafiz Saeed.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Congress is hiding the details of their party president Rahul Gandhi's citizenship. Rahul Gandhi's real name is Rahul Vincy. They are cheating people by hiding the real names of Rahul Gandhi and Priyanka Gandhi Vadra.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The youth should work on popularising central and state government schemes among people. The young generation should make social media their weapon.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I am not putting a check on anyone. I just have to say that India's Constitution has given certain rights and freedom to people, but there are some limits, too.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: We want to make Uttar Pradesh the most developed state in the country.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The Election Commission stopped me from campaigning. I accepted it and reached people through my prayer - in silence. People gave their approval. Praying in silence is important, and this spiritual prayer has paid off.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I have always faced challenges in my life.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Modiji is a BJP worker, and crores of karyakartas are proud of the fact that an ordinary worker has become a beloved personality in India and abroad.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: We are not intoxicated by power. We are concerned about the betterment of the poor, marginalised, oppressed, farmers, women, those living in villages, and every section of society.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: If Bombay can become Mumbai, Bangalore can become Bengaluru, Madras can become Chennai, and Calcutta can become Kolkota, there is no reason why Allahabad should not become Prayagraj and Faizabad should not become Ayodhya. To re-establish our original identity, we have renamed these places. I am happy that people have welcomed this.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I am well aware of the politics of Uttar Pradesh, as I have had multiple stints as a member of Parliament. I know how politics works here.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: We want to channelize the youth so that the state benefits from them and help Uttar Pradesh become a developed state.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: People know Modi did not do anything for himself. Whatever he has done is for people and the country.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: If a person is too 'satisfied', then he might become complacent, not work so hard to get ahead.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: My resolve is to work for the development of the state and the welfare of the people, so I will tackle all challenges. That's my vision.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Jinnah cannot be honoured in India. He's responsible for the partition of our country. No Jinnah eulogy is acceptable in India.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Sadhvi Pragya is an answer to those who have maligned the image of Hindus by using the phrase 'Hindu terrorism.'
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: I will face the challenges of U.P. We will make U.P. an ideal state. People of the state and the Government of India are fully cooperating with me. U.P. will be an example for India.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: After Modi became the PM, development happened across the country.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The day every poor person in this country has a toilet in his home and his fuel requirements are met, whoever is the PM then shall rule for at least 25 years.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Just like if you leave energy free and uncontrolled and unregulated, it may become useless and destructive. Similarly, 'shakti swaroopa stree'- woman as the epitome of power - does not really need freedom but a meaningful role with protection and channelisation.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: We have adopted zero-tolerance policy against terrorism. We have not fed biryani to terrorists.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Modi implemented welfare schemes, and U.P. became its major beneficiary in barely two years.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Public sentiment should be respected.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: The problem is that there are not enough opportunities for the youngsters in U.P. which forces them to migrate. Our aim is to provide employment to 90% youngsters.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Most of the people who oppose idol worshipping belong to TMC.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Assess and then decide whether women who are in active politics and public life, like men, whether in this process they may not lose their importance and role as mothers, daughter, and sisters.
author: Yogi Adityanath

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You can have everything in life you want, if you will just help other people get what they want.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing - that's why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you aim at nothing, you'll hit it every time.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The first step in solving a problem is to recognize that it does exist.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions. The more you express gratitude for what you have, the more likely you will have even more to express gratitude for.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: With integrity, you have nothing to fear, since you have nothing to hide. With integrity, you will do the right thing, so you will have no guilt.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You were designed for accomplishment, engineered for success, and endowed with the seeds of greatness.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action, and discipline that enabled us to follow through.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Yesterday ended last night. Today is a brand-new day.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There are no traffic jams on the extra mile.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Sometimes adversity is what you need to face in order to become successful.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Outstanding people have one thing in common: An absolute sense of mission.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Every sale has five basic obstacles: no need, no money, no hurry, no desire, no trust.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Do more than you are being paid to do, and you'll eventually be paid more for what you do.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Be careful not to compromise what you want most for what you want now.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You are who you are and what you are because of what has gone into your mind. You can change who you are and what you are by changing what goes into your mind.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Be grateful for what you have and stop complaining - it bores everybody else, does you no good, and doesn't solve any problems.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Time can be an ally or an enemy. What it becomes depends entirely upon you, your goals, and your determination to use every available minute.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I have always said that everyone is in sales. Maybe you don't hold the title of salesperson, but if the business you are in requires you to deal with people, you, my friend, are in sales.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You never know when a moment and a few sincere words can have an impact on a life.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: People don't buy for logical reasons. They buy for emotional reasons.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: People are basically the same the world over. Everybody wants the same things - to be happy, to be healthy, to be at least reasonably prosperous, and to be secure. They want friends, peace of mind, good family relationships, and hope that tomorrow is going to be even better than today.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You do not pay the price of success, you enjoy the price of success.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You cannot climb the ladder of success dressed in the costume of failure.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You don't drown by falling into water. You only drown if you stay there.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You've got to be before you can do and do before you can have.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you go looking for a friend, you're going to find they're very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Take time to be kind and to say 'thank you.'
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you don't see yourself as a winner, then you cannot perform as a winner.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When you encourage others, you in the process are encouraged because you're making a commitment and difference in that person's life. Encouragement really does make a difference.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: When you are tough on yourself, life is going to be infinitely easier on you.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Honesty and integrity are by far the most important assets of an entrepreneur.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Until you are happy with who you are, you will never be happy because of what you have.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Every choice you make has an end result.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: I read the paper every day and the Bible every day; that way I know what both sides are up to.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Failure is a detour, not a dead-end street.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Confidence is going after Moby Dick in a rowboat and taking tartar sauce with you.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If you treat your wife like a thoroughbred, you'll never end up with a nag.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The person who dumps garbage into your mind will do you considerably more harm than the person who dumps garbage on your floor, because each load of mind garbage negatively impacts your possibilities and lowers your expectations.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It's not the situation, but whether we react negative or respond positive to the situation that is important.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Send out a cheerful, positive greeting, and most of the time you will get back a cheerful, positive greeting. It's also true that if you send out a negative greeting, you will, in most cases, get back a negative greeting.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: At Barca, players were banned from driving their sports cars to training.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I think I'm like wine. The older I get, the better I get.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I did many stupid things. I made many mistakes, but I learnt from everything. I still make mistakes; I still learn from them. Nobody is perfect.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I can't help but laugh at how perfect I am.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Arsene Wenger asked me to have a trial with Arsenal when I was 17. I turned it down. Zlatan doesn't do auditions.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I know I'm good enough. I don't need to show it to you. Either you know who I am, or you don't.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Some things is made by destiny, yes, other things by hard work, but quality you don't learn. Quality you are born with.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I always put myself second - I like to make others happy.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When you have my confidence, I will do 200% for you.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: My father is from Bosnia, and my mother is from Croatia, but I was born in Sweden.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Nothing is written in stone, as a career is an unpredictable journey.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I decide my future. I decide what I want to do. Nobody else. If I decide this will be my last year, maybe it is. If I decide it will be my last contract, I decide that. Nobody else. So I will decide when the moment is there.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I'm like the wine. The older I get, the better I get.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Lionel Messi is awesome.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When people criticize me, instead of putting my head down, it gives me energy to do even more.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: It is nice to know that even David Beckham doesn't have good taste in everything.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When you buy me, you are buying a Ferrari. If you drive a Ferrari, you put premium petrol in the tank, you hit the motorway, and you step on the gas.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I read all the time that people think I'm arrogant. They say I am cocky, a bad character. I had that from a young age. But when they meet me, they say, 'That image doesn't fit you.'
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I always want to become better. If never being satisfied is a problem, then I have it. At least it's a good problem.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I think I am difficult to satisfy, because when I win something, I'm already thinking about the next step, and that is maybe a problem for me. I'm not enjoying the moment. I'm already on the mission to win the next trophy.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I don't like to talk about myself.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Anything that happens in your life was meant to happen. It is your destiny. I was destined to have the life I have now, and I can't have any regrets.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When I took my shirt off against Caen, everybody asked what these new tattoos were. I had 15 removable tattoos on my body; they are the names of real people who are suffering from hunger in the world.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If anything, the children of Paris should be giving me even more money for having the privilege of being in the same city as my incredible quality. And so should David Beckham. Call it a Zlaritable donation.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Never judge a person if you don't know him.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If you are too nice, you will just get eaten alive. The football world is not always a nice place.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When I arrived at Barcelona, I was following a dream, but I now realize sometimes it's better to be content with what you have rather than follow a dream which nearly kills you.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: One thing is for sure: a World Cup without me is nothing to watch.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I want to be remembered as the football player I was. The private person is nobody's business.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I'm not difficult to work with, trust me.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I'm used to having a camera in my face but not a camera following me.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I respect the Premier League.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I wish anyone in this world could go to his fridge and pick whatever he wants. Because the day you open your fridge and there is nothing in it, it is difficult.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When I started to play football, when I was around 15, 16, I remember the players that played on the national team and noticed that it was only typically Swedish guys.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Do you know what I love about hunting? That I am no one in the woods, no one at all. I thought the animals might recognize me, but they didn't. They did not even ask me for any autographs.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If I had an ego as big as the Eiffel Tower, would I have won this many collective trophies? I know people like to talk about it. And O.K., I am not going to answer every story. But maybe I will let my collective trophies speak for themselves. I don't know many other footballers who have won as much. Do you?
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Wherever I go, people recognize me, call my name, cheer me.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: You never forget where you come from.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: People often write after they finish their career, or they don't play anymore, or they are not anymore active. So I say, why do that? And let's do it differently.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If I'd gone into taekwondo, I'd probably have won several Olympic medals.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Who is most deserving of all of the money that I, Zlatan, am paid? The answer is Zlatan.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Every player needs a little time to adjust to new teammates and the mentality of the coach when you change clubs.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: You were born as the one you are.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: One time I got dressed in all black, Rambo-style, and took a massive pair of bolt-cutters and nicked a military bike.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: People trash talk me.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When I went to Juventus, I was young, but in training, I had legends like Fabio Cannavaro and Lilian Thuram marking me. I had to work hard to get my respect.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I had time with my mother, but I really lived with my father. One time he gave all his salary so I could travel to a training camp. He couldn't pay the rent, but he did that.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I would love to play alongside Wayne Rooney. He does the running of two or three players and makes a lot of space. We would be the perfect combination.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Whenever life's at a standstill, I need some action.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Jose Mourinho is a big star... he's cool.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I am a guy who likes those who drive through red lights.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If you are different, or you have minimum possibilities, you can still succeed. I am living proof of that.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: An injured Zlatan is a pretty serious thing for any team.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: People are very curious and have written a lot of things about me. Right or not. I never comment on those things, because it's not much of my thing to comment on everything that's written about me.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I still feel I need to do things 10 times better than other players. Just to be accepted and to improve myself.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: When you are the invisible man to the head coach, the only option is to head for the exit.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: The day I leave Paris is the day I go down a level or quit football.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: That's my hunger. If I start to relax, and I lose that, then I had better stop my football. I need that hunger. I still feel I need to do things 10 times better than other players. Just to be accepted and to improve myself.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: I'm not someone who feels settled.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: If you can't describe what you are doing as a process, you don't know what you're doing.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote:
Quote of the Day


The world of reality has its limits; the world of imagination is boundless.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote:
Love Quote of the Day


A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote:
Art Quote of the Day


I have no fear of making changes, destroying the image, etc., because the painting has a life of its own.
author: Jackson Pollock

quote:
Nature Quote of the Day


Land is the secure ground of home, the sea is like life, the outside, the unknown.
author: Stephen Gardiner

quote:
Funny Quote Of the Day


Candy is dandy but liquor is quicker.
author: Ogden Nash
